answers.text:
Cal-ICMA's Management Talent Exchange Program might have relevant resources: http://www.discovermtep.org.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Sunnyvale, CA is interested to learn if any agencies have a policy allowing employees in the same classification to swap positions in order to gain experience in different positions?  If yes, please send a link/copy of your policy.
Thank you
Lesley
Lesley Boncich
Human Resources Analyst
City of Sunnyvale
408-730-7499
LBoncich@ci.sunnyvale.ca.us
title: Job Swaping - Same Classification
